summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff discussing a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. It highlights the need for a schedule change and mentions Harry Best in relation to the communication.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the email correspondence regarding the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Harry Best
persons.context: Harry Best is mentioned as someone who will need to deal with the information being sent in relation to the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
